reviewText: The baby loves mario... ANY MARIO movie, so thanks for helping us make is 3rd birthday special for him.  Thanks
My nine year old loves Mario video games. When he saw there were movies he had to have them.  These made a great present.
I bought this for my two sons, they love to watch this movie. This was definately a great purchase, Thank you
Item came as described. My kids love Mario Bros. so this was a great addition. Came in a timely manner. Good seller.
Is gonna wear it out watching it so much
MARIO AND LUIGI SOLVE THE TROUBLE WITH THE KOOPAS IN THIS COLORFUL AND CUTE INSTALLMENT OF THE MARIO SAGA. KIDS WILL LOVE IT

This was a gift for a 5 year olds birthday party..  The family went out of town for Spring Break and the mother told me that the movie was a great idea as it kept her boys entertained on the drive.  They love this movie and watch it over and over again.
I gave this DVD as a gift. The kids love it. When I ordered it I thought it was a Nintendo Wii game but the DVD was enjoyed.
If your child loves Mario like mine does, then get these dvds. They are on the cheap. Usually about $5 - $7. Well worth it. Time well spent and usually rewatched.
my 2 year old likes this show and was happy to get it for christmas well worth getting and the music is off the game.
my kids love Mario this are old cartoons but they love it , I do not like it because the quality IS HORRIBLE ,
Apparently we were the hit of my Granddaughter's birthday.  She loves Mario and this was a hit.  It will get a lot of play time in their home.
I was happy to buy this and watch it with my 7 year old, it brought back memories of my own childhood! Great for any Mario fan!

This was a Christmas gift fo my 5 yea old nephew  and he really liked it. I have not seen it but the movie did hold his attention for the duration of the movie. If he doesn't like a movie, he just gets up and starts doing something else.
love !
Item come as described and my God children love it. There Nintendo finatics so this was right up there alley. They were very pleased with it we had to buy the other one. Great for children.
Really cool my son usually doesn't love to read but this was perfect now I just need to get him more lol
Kids love it.
Got it fast, daughter hasn't seen it yet because I put it in her easter basket. I love watching old movies
EXCELLENT
My youngest is delighted with these dvd's. He's a great Mario Bros fan and enjoys watching very much. I will be buying more.
